jcr:content.jcr:title: Wikipedia:WikiProject Cephalopods/order taxobox example with picture

contentheadline.headline: Wikipedia:WikiProject Cephalopods/order taxobox example with picture

contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Common Cuttlefish | image = Sepia officinalis.jpg | image_caption = ''[[Sepia officinalis]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Mollusca]] | classis = [[Cephalopod]]a | ordo = [[Sepiida]] | familia = [[Sepiidae]] | genus = ''[[Sepia (genus)|Sepia]]'' | subgenus = ''[[Sepia (subgenus)|Sepia]]'' | species = '''''S. officinalis''''' | binomial = ''Sepia officinalis'' | binomial_authority = [[Linnaeus]], 1758 | synonyms = *''Sepia rugosa''<br><small>Bowdich, 1822</small> *''Sepia vicellius''<br><small>Gray, 1849</small> *''Sepia zebrina''<br><small>Risso, 1854</small> *''Sepia filliouxi''<br><small>Lafont, 1869</small> *?''Sepia fischeri''<br><small>Lafont, 1871</small> *''Sepia officinalis mediterranea''<br><small>Ninni, 1884</small> *?''Sepia veranyi''<br><small>P. Fischer ''in'' Lagatu, 1888</small> }} ==Things to note:== * Usually the taxobox heading is the '''common name''' of the organism in bold type. The taxobox name and the article title, should always be singular. * If there is '''no''' suitable '''common name''', use the '''scientific name''' instead. ==Example ready for cut and paste== <pre style="overflow:auto"> {{Taxobox | name = Common Cuttlefish | image = Sepia officinalis.jpg | image_caption = ''[[Sepia officinalis]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Mollusca]] | classis = [[Cephalopod]]a | ordo = [[Sepiida]] | familia = [[Sepiidae]] | genus = ''[[Sepia (genus)|Sepia]]'' | subgenus = ''[[Sepia (subgenus)|Sepia]]'' | species = '''''S. officinalis''''' | binomial = ''Sepia officinalis'' | binomial_authority = [[Linnaeus]], 1758 | synonyms = *''Sepia rugosa''<br><small>Bowdich, 1822</small> *''Sepia vicellius''<br><small>Gray, 1849</small> *''Sepia zebrina''<br><small>Risso, 1854</small> *''Sepia filliouxi''<br><small>Lafont, 1869</small> *?''Sepia fischeri''<br><small>Lafont, 1871</small> *''Sepia officinalis mediterranea''<br><small>Ninni, 1884</small> *?''Sepia veranyi''<br><small>P. Fischer ''in'' Lagatu, 1888</small> }} </pre>
